Handkerchief Haven: A smartphone app that uses AI to detect when you're crying and automatically sends a handkerchief to your location.
Handkerchief Hotel: A pop-up hotel that transforms into a cozy, comfortable space for guests to rest and recover from their sneezes.
Handkerchief Hub: A community center that provides a space for people to share their handkerchiefs and connect with others who understand the struggles of sneezing.
Handkerchief Hideaway: A line of portable, discreet handkerchiefs that can be easily tucked away in a purse or pocket.
